definition[0]: the group of people responsible for the government of a particular area, town, or city in the UK
example[0]: Central government is trying to stop local authorities overspending.

definition[1]: a level of local government in the UK, part of which is responsible for education in its particular area
definition[2]: a government organization in Britain that is responsible for providing public services such as schools, the collection of rubbish etc in a particular area
